text:
The Iron Circle is a powerful troop of mercenaries that served [[Breland]] during the latter years of the [[Last War]]. They primarily fought against the forces of [[Aundair]] and [[Thrane]]. The troop gained ignominy for their wanton cruelty and for engaging targets without orders, and their contract with the Brelish military was cancelled before the end of the war.

Today, the Iron Circle is a wandering band of brigands who raid small settlements in central [[Breland]] and then retreat into hiding. However, they have begun reconnaissance and preparations for a larger, bolder coordinated operation. They have recently set their sites on [[Harkenwold]] county, as Count [[Alben ir'Clarn]] frequently leaves his keep for months at a time, leaving his aging steward in charge. If they can take control of the keep, bribe the [[Municipal Guard|Breland Municipal Guard]], and stamp out militia resistance before it can mobilize, they can bleed the whole county dry before the Count comes back.

Iron Circle members are primarily [[human]], though other [[humanoid]] species can be found in the organization's ranks. New enlistees rise from the ranks of common thugs, thieves, and cutthroats, but some are elite fighters who are capable of planning and carrying out sophisticated tactical maneuvers. The Iron Circle also employs powerful mages who have forged infernal pacts with a mysterious great [[fiend]], and thus can summon and command [[tar devil]]s to fight on their behalf. The gang's recent plot to enact a high-profile takeover of a county may be driven by these dark covenants.

The Iron Circle is led by [[Nazin Redthorn]].
title: Iron Circle
